titleStmt.title: A disproufe of M. Novvelles reproufe. By Thomas Dorman Bachiler of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Dorman, Thomas, d. 1577?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Laet, Anno Domini 1565. 3 Decembris, with speciall priuileage,

notesStmt.note: A response to STC 18740: Nowell, Alexander. Reproufe of a booke entituled, A proufe of certayne articles in religion denied by M. Juell.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
